DOC.brief_summary: This protocol describe observational study whose goal collect de-identified Coronary CT Angiography ( CCTA ) acquisition factor interpretation ( finding ) several hundred U.S. international imaging facility . The study use electronic data capture tool collect de-identified CCTA utilization parameter clinical finding order create multi-center registry . This registry use scientific analysis publication pertinent medical trend CT utilization , radiation dose , common cardiovascular finding . The registry use determine area interest future randomize controlled trial . All data collect patient identifier remove complete accordance HIPAA regulation . All data analyze aggregate , thus minimize risk patient confidentiality violation .
